<Link id="l00039" /><CodeLine lineNumber="39"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// The instructions after \\p IP are moved to the beginning of \\p New which must</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00053" /><CodeLine lineNumber="53"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Split a BasicBlock at an InsertPoint, even if the block is degenerate</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00054" /><CodeLine lineNumber="54"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// (missing the terminator).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00055" /><CodeLine lineNumber="55"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00056" /><CodeLine lineNumber="56"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// llvm::SplitBasicBlock and BasicBlock::splitBasicBlock require a well-formed</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00057" /><CodeLine lineNumber="57"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// BasicBlock. \\p Name is used for the new successor block. If \\p CreateBranch</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00058" /><CodeLine lineNumber="58"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// is true, a branch to the new successor will new created such that</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00082" /><CodeLine lineNumber="82"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Captures attributes that affect generating LLVM-IR using the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00083" /><CodeLine lineNumber="83"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// OpenMPIRBuilder and related classes. Note that not all attributes are</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00084" /><CodeLine lineNumber="84"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// required for all classes or functions. In some use cases the configuration</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00085" /><CodeLine lineNumber="85"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// is not necessary at all, because because the only functions that are called</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00086" /><CodeLine lineNumber="86"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// are ones that are not dependent on the configuration.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00087" /><CodeLine lineNumber="87" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/openmpirbuilderconfig"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">class </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/openmpirbuilderconfig/#a700297913ed317f4442b189b1efdd454">OpenMPIRBuilderConfig</a> &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00090" /><CodeLine lineNumber="90"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// (if set to false) or device (if set to true) in an offloading context. It</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00091" /><CodeLine lineNumber="91"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// is set when the -fopenmp-is-target-device compiler frontend option is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00092" /><CodeLine lineNumber="92"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// specified.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00093" /><CodeLine lineNumber="93" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/openmpirbuilderconfig/#a22e985ea690b791910dc19186b63cc37"><span class="doxyHighlight">  std::optional&lt;bool&gt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/openmpirbuilderconfig/#a22e985ea690b791910dc19186b63cc37">IsTargetDevice</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00094" /><CodeLine lineNumber="94"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00095" /><CodeLine lineNumber="95"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Flag for specifying if the compilation is done for an accelerator. It is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00096" /><CodeLine lineNumber="96"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// set according to the architecture of the target triple and currently only</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00097" /><CodeLine lineNumber="97"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// true when targeting AMDGPU or NVPTX. Today, these targets can only perform</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00098" /><CodeLine lineNumber="98"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// the role of an OpenMP target device, so &#96;IsTargetDevice&#96; must also be true</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00099" /><CodeLine lineNumber="99"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// if &#96;IsGPU&#96; is true. This restriction might be lifted if an accelerator-</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00100" /><CodeLine lineNumber="100"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// like target with the ability to work as the OpenMP host is added, or if</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00101" /><CodeLine lineNumber="101"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// the capabilities of the currently supported GPU architectures are</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00102" /><CodeLine lineNumber="102"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// expanded.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00103" /><CodeLine lineNumber="103" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/openmpirbuilderconfig/#a24001aad64c43839eee308e15ad21166"><span class="doxyHighlight">  std::optional&lt;bool&gt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/openmpirbuilderconfig/#a24001aad64c43839eee308e15ad21166">IsGPU</a>;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00570" /><CodeLine lineNumber="570"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Callback type for body (=inner region) code generation</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00571" /><CodeLine lineNumber="571"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00572" /><CodeLine lineNumber="572"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// The callback takes code locations as arguments, each describing a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00573" /><CodeLine lineNumber="573"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// location where additional instructions can be inserted.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00574" /><CodeLine lineNumber="574"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00575" /><CodeLine lineNumber="575"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// The CodeGenIP may be in the middle of a basic block or point to the end of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00576" /><CodeLine lineNumber="576"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// it. The basic block may have a terminator or be degenerate. The callback</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00577" /><CodeLine lineNumber="577"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// function may just insert instructions at that position, but also split the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00578" /><CodeLine lineNumber="578"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// block (without the Before argument of BasicBlock::splitBasicBlock such</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00579" /><CodeLine lineNumber="579"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// that the identify of the split predecessor block is preserved) and insert</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00580" /><CodeLine lineNumber="580"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// additional control flow, including branches that do not lead back to what</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00581" /><CodeLine lineNumber="581"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// follows the CodeGenIP. Note that since the callback is allowed to split</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00582" /><CodeLine lineNumber="582"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// the block, callers must assume that InsertPoints to positions in the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00583" /><CodeLine lineNumber="583"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// BasicBlock after CodeGenIP including CodeGenIP itself are invalidated. If</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00584" /><CodeLine lineNumber="584"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// such InsertPoints need to be preserved, it can split the block itself</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00585" /><CodeLine lineNumber="585"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// before calling the callback.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00586" /><CodeLine lineNumber="586"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00587" /><CodeLine lineNumber="587"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// AllocaIP and CodeGenIP must not point to the same position.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00588" /><CodeLine lineNumber="588"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00589" /><CodeLine lineNumber="589"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\param AllocaIP is the insertion point at which new alloca instructions</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00590" /><CodeLine lineNumber="590"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///                 should be placed. The BasicBlock it is pointing to must</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00591" /><CodeLine lineNumber="591"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///                 not be split.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00592" /><CodeLine lineNumber="592"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\param CodeGenIP is the insertion point at which the body code should be</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00593" /><CodeLine lineNumber="593"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///                  placed.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00594" /><CodeLine lineNumber="594"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00595" /><CodeLine lineNumber="595"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\return an error, if any were triggered during execution.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00596" /><CodeLine lineNumber="596" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/openmpirbuilder/#a49e35e3ee470add16efcde1ab5d5556b"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">using </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/openmpirbuilder/#a49e35e3ee470add16efcde1ab5d5556b">BodyGenCallbackTy</a> =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00597" /><CodeLine lineNumber="597"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/function-ref">function&#95;ref</a>&lt;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac226f3d2b9ca090171a8e0a8cb92c343a902b0d55fddef6f8d651fe1035b7d4bd">Error</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/openmpirbuilder/#aafc1886793b898052f87edd7e9fdbaa3">InsertPointTy</a> AllocaIP, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/openmpirbuilder/#aafc1886793b898052f87edd7e9fdbaa3">InsertPointTy</a> CodeGenIP)&gt;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00598" /><CodeLine lineNumber="598"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00599" /><CodeLine lineNumber="599"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This is created primarily for sections construct as llvm::function&#95;ref</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00600" /><CodeLine lineNumber="600"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// (BodyGenCallbackTy) is not storable (as described in the comments of</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00603" /><CodeLine lineNumber="603"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00604" /><CodeLine lineNumber="604"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\return an error, if any were triggered during execution.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00607" /><CodeLine lineNumber="607"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00608" /><CodeLine lineNumber="608"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Callback type for loop body code generation.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00609" /><CodeLine lineNumber="609"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00610" /><CodeLine lineNumber="610"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\param CodeGenIP is the insertion point where the loop&#39;s body code must be</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00611" /><CodeLine lineNumber="611"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///                  placed. This will be a dedicated BasicBlock with a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00612" /><CodeLine lineNumber="612"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///                  conditional branch from the loop condition check and</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00613" /><CodeLine lineNumber="613"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///                  terminated with an unconditional branch to the loop</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00615" /><CodeLine lineNumber="615"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\param IndVar    is the induction variable usable at the insertion point.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00616" /><CodeLine lineNumber="616"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00617" /><CodeLine lineNumber="617"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\return an error, if any were triggered during execution.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00618" /><CodeLine lineNumber="618" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/openmpirbuilder/#a296d2e28bddf1051d614f48b61005899"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">using </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/openmpirbuilder/#a296d2e28bddf1051d614f48b61005899">LoopBodyGenCallbackTy</a> =</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00705" /><CodeLine lineNumber="705"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Generator for the control flow structure of an OpenMP canonical loop.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00706" /><CodeLine lineNumber="706"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00707" /><CodeLine lineNumber="707"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// This generator operates on the logical iteration space of the loop, i.e.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00708" /><CodeLine lineNumber="708"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// the caller only has to provide a loop trip count of the loop as defined by</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00709" /><CodeLine lineNumber="709"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// base language semantics. The trip count is interpreted as an unsigned</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00710" /><CodeLine lineNumber="710"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// integer. The induction variable passed to \\p BodyGenCB will be of the same</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00711" /><CodeLine lineNumber="711"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// type and run from 0 to \\p TripCount - 1 It is up to the callback to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00712" /><CodeLine lineNumber="712"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// convert the logical iteration variable to the loop counter variable in the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00713" /><CodeLine lineNumber="713"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// loop body.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00714" /><CodeLine lineNumber="714"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00715" /><CodeLine lineNumber="715"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\param Loc       The insert and source location description. The insert</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00716" /><CodeLine lineNumber="716"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///                  location can be between two instructions or the end of a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00717" /><CodeLine lineNumber="717"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///                  degenerate block (e.g. a BB under construction).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00718" /><CodeLine lineNumber="718"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\param BodyGenCB Callback that will generate the loop body code.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00719" /><CodeLine lineNumber="719"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\param TripCount Number of iterations the loop body is executed.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00720" /><CodeLine lineNumber="720"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\param Name      Base name used to derive BB and instruction names.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00721" /><CodeLine lineNumber="721"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00722" /><CodeLine lineNumber="722"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\returns An object representing the created control flow structure which</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00723" /><CodeLine lineNumber="723"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///          can be used for loop-associated directives.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00724" /><CodeLine lineNumber="724"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/expected">Expected&lt;CanonicalLoopInfo &#42;&gt;</a></span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00725" /><CodeLine lineNumber="725"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/openmpirbuilder/#ae0287686a5ffe03bc264972c862726ea">createCanonicalLoop</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/openmpirbuilder/locationdescription">LocationDescription</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/loc">Loc</a>,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00726" /><CodeLine lineNumber="726"><span class="doxyHighlight">                      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/openmpirbuilder/#a296d2e28bddf1051d614f48b61005899">LoopBodyGenCallbackTy</a> BodyGenCB, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;TripCount,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00727" /><CodeLine lineNumber="727"><span class="doxyHighlight">                      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/twine">Twine</a> &amp;Name = </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;loop&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00728" /><CodeLine lineNumber="728"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00729" /><CodeLine lineNumber="729"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Generator for the control flow structure of an OpenMP canonical loop.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00730" /><CodeLine lineNumber="730"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00731" /><CodeLine lineNumber="731"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Instead of a logical iteration space, this allows specifying user-defined</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00732" /><CodeLine lineNumber="732"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// loop counter values using increment, upper- and lower bounds. To</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00733" /><CodeLine lineNumber="733"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// disambiguate the terminology when counting downwards, instead of lower</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00734" /><CodeLine lineNumber="734"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// bounds we use \\p Start for the loop counter value in the first body</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00735" /><CodeLine lineNumber="735"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// iteration.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00736" /><CodeLine lineNumber="736"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00737" /><CodeLine lineNumber="737"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Consider the following limitations:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00738" /><CodeLine lineNumber="738"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00739" /><CodeLine lineNumber="739"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///  &#42; A loop counter space over all integer values of its bit-width cannot be</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00740" /><CodeLine lineNumber="740"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///    represented. E.g using uint8&#95;t, its loop trip count of 256 cannot be</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00741" /><CodeLine lineNumber="741"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///    stored into an 8 bit integer):</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00742" /><CodeLine lineNumber="742"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00743" /><CodeLine lineNumber="743"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///      DO I = 0, 255, 1</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00744" /><CodeLine lineNumber="744"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00745" /><CodeLine lineNumber="745"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///  &#42; Unsigned wrapping is only supported when wrapping only &quot;once&quot;; E.g.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00746" /><CodeLine lineNumber="746"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///    effectively counting downwards:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00747" /><CodeLine lineNumber="747"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00748" /><CodeLine lineNumber="748"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///      for (uint8&#95;t i = 100u; i &gt; 0; i += 127u)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00749" /><CodeLine lineNumber="749"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00750" /><CodeLine lineNumber="750"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00751" /><CodeLine lineNumber="751"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// TODO: May need to add additional parameters to represent:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00752" /><CodeLine lineNumber="752"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00753" /><CodeLine lineNumber="753"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///  &#42; Allow representing downcounting with unsigned integers.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00754" /><CodeLine lineNumber="754"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00755" /><CodeLine lineNumber="755"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///  &#42; Sign of the step and the comparison operator might disagree:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00756" /><CodeLine lineNumber="756"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00757" /><CodeLine lineNumber="757"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///      for (int i = 0; i &lt; 42; i -= 1u)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00758" /><CodeLine lineNumber="758"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00759" /><CodeLine lineNumber="759"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00760" /><CodeLine lineNumber="760"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\param Loc       The insert and source location description.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00761" /><CodeLine lineNumber="761"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\param BodyGenCB Callback that will generate the loop body code.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00762" /><CodeLine lineNumber="762"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\param Start     Value of the loop counter for the first iterations.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00763" /><CodeLine lineNumber="763"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\param Stop      Loop counter values past this will stop the loop.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00764" /><CodeLine lineNumber="764"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\param Step      Loop counter increment after each iteration; negative</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00765" /><CodeLine lineNumber="765"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///                  means counting down.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00766" /><CodeLine lineNumber="766"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\param IsSigned  Whether Start, Stop and Step are signed integers.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00767" /><CodeLine lineNumber="767"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\param InclusiveStop Whether \\p Stop itself is a valid value for the loop</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00768" /><CodeLine lineNumber="768"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///                      counter.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00769" /><CodeLine lineNumber="769"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\param ComputeIP Insertion point for instructions computing the trip</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00770" /><CodeLine lineNumber="770"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///                  count. Can be used to ensure the trip count is available</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00771" /><CodeLine lineNumber="771"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///                  at the outermost loop of a loop nest. If not set,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00772" /><CodeLine lineNumber="772"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///                  defaults to the preheader of the generated loop.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00773" /><CodeLine lineNumber="773"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\param Name      Base name used to derive BB and instruction names.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00774" /><CodeLine lineNumber="774"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00775" /><CodeLine lineNumber="775"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\returns An object representing the created control flow structure which</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00776" /><CodeLine lineNumber="776"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///          can be used for loop-associated directives.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00777" /><CodeLine lineNumber="777"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/expected">Expected&lt;CanonicalLoopInfo &#42;&gt;</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/openmpirbuilder/#ae0287686a5ffe03bc264972c862726ea">createCanonicalLoop</a>(</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00778" /><CodeLine lineNumber="778"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/openmpirbuilder/locationdescription">LocationDescription</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/loc">Loc</a>, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/openmpirbuilder/#a296d2e28bddf1051d614f48b61005899">LoopBodyGenCallbackTy</a> BodyGenCB,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00779" /><CodeLine lineNumber="779"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;Start, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;Stop, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;Step, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> IsSigned, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> InclusiveStop,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00780" /><CodeLine lineNumber="780"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/openmpirbuilder/#aafc1886793b898052f87edd7e9fdbaa3">InsertPointTy</a> ComputeIP = &#123;&#125;, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/twine">Twine</a> &amp;Name = </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;loop&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00781" /><CodeLine lineNumber="781"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00782" /><CodeLine lineNumber="782"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Collapse a loop nest into a single loop.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00783" /><CodeLine lineNumber="783"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00784" /><CodeLine lineNumber="784"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Merges loops of a loop nest into a single CanonicalLoopNest representation</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00785" /><CodeLine lineNumber="785"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// that has the same number of innermost loop iterations as the origin loop</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00786" /><CodeLine lineNumber="786"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// nest. The induction variables of the input loops are derived from the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00787" /><CodeLine lineNumber="787"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// collapsed loop&#39;s induction variable. This is intended to be used to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00788" /><CodeLine lineNumber="788"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// implement OpenMP&#39;s collapse clause. Before applying a directive,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00789" /><CodeLine lineNumber="789"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// collapseLoops normalizes a loop nest to contain only a single loop and the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00790" /><CodeLine lineNumber="790"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// directive&#39;s implementation does not need to handle multiple loops itself.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00791" /><CodeLine lineNumber="791"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// This does not remove the need to handle all loop nest handling by</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00792" /><CodeLine lineNumber="792"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// directives, such as the ordered(&lt;n&gt;) clause or the simd schedule-clause</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00793" /><CodeLine lineNumber="793"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// modifier of the worksharing-loop directive.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00794" /><CodeLine lineNumber="794"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00795" /><CodeLine lineNumber="795"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Example:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00796" /><CodeLine lineNumber="796"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\code</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00797" /><CodeLine lineNumber="797"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///   for (int i = 0; i &lt; 7; ++i) // Canonical loop &quot;i&quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00798" /><CodeLine lineNumber="798"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///     for (int j = 0; j &lt; 9; ++j) // Canonical loop &quot;j&quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00799" /><CodeLine lineNumber="799"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///       body(i, j);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00800" /><CodeLine lineNumber="800"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\endcode</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00801" /><CodeLine lineNumber="801"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00802" /><CodeLine lineNumber="802"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// After collapsing with Loops=&#123;i,j&#125;, the loop is changed to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00803" /><CodeLine lineNumber="803"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\code</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00804" /><CodeLine lineNumber="804"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///   for (int ij = 0; ij &lt; 63; ++ij) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00805" /><CodeLine lineNumber="805"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///     int i = ij / 9;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00806" /><CodeLine lineNumber="806"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///     int j = ij % 9;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00807" /><CodeLine lineNumber="807"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///     body(i, j);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00808" /><CodeLine lineNumber="808"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///   &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00809" /><CodeLine lineNumber="809"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\endcode</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00810" /><CodeLine lineNumber="810"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00811" /><CodeLine lineNumber="811"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// In the current implementation, the following limitations apply:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00812" /><CodeLine lineNumber="812"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00813" /><CodeLine lineNumber="813"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///  &#42; All input loops have an induction variable of the same type.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00814" /><CodeLine lineNumber="814"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00815" /><CodeLine lineNumber="815"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///  &#42; The collapsed loop will have the same trip count integer type as the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00816" /><CodeLine lineNumber="816"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///    input loops. Therefore it is possible that the collapsed loop cannot</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00817" /><CodeLine lineNumber="817"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///    represent all iterations of the input loops. For instance, assuming a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00818" /><CodeLine lineNumber="818"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///    32 bit integer type, and two input loops both iterating 2^16 times, the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00819" /><CodeLine lineNumber="819"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///    theoretical trip count of the collapsed loop would be 2^32 iteration,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00820" /><CodeLine lineNumber="820"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///    which cannot be represented in an 32-bit integer. Behavior is undefined</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00821" /><CodeLine lineNumber="821"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///    in this case.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00822" /><CodeLine lineNumber="822"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00823" /><CodeLine lineNumber="823"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///  &#42; The trip counts of every input loop must be available at \\p ComputeIP.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00824" /><CodeLine lineNumber="824"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///    Non-rectangular loops are not yet supported.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00825" /><CodeLine lineNumber="825"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00826" /><CodeLine lineNumber="826"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///  &#42; At each nest level, code between a surrounding loop and its nested loop</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00827" /><CodeLine lineNumber="827"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///    is hoisted into the loop body, and such code will be executed more</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00828" /><CodeLine lineNumber="828"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///    often than before collapsing (or not at all if any inner loop iteration</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00829" /><CodeLine lineNumber="829"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///    has a trip count of 0). This is permitted by the OpenMP specification.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00830" /><CodeLine lineNumber="830"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00831" /><CodeLine lineNumber="831"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\param DL        Debug location for instructions added for collapsing,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00832" /><CodeLine lineNumber="832"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///                  such as instructions to compute/derive the input loop&#39;s</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00833" /><CodeLine lineNumber="833"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///                  induction variables.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00834" /><CodeLine lineNumber="834"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\param Loops     Loops in the loop nest to collapse. Loops are specified</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00835" /><CodeLine lineNumber="835"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///                  from outermost-to-innermost and every control flow of a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00836" /><CodeLine lineNumber="836"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///                  loop&#39;s body must pass through its directly nested loop.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00837" /><CodeLine lineNumber="837"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\param ComputeIP Where additional instruction that compute the collapsed</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00838" /><CodeLine lineNumber="838"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///                  trip count. If not set, defaults to before the generated</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00839" /><CodeLine lineNumber="839"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///                  loop.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00840" /><CodeLine lineNumber="840"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00841" /><CodeLine lineNumber="841"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\returns The CanonicalLoopInfo object representing the collapsed loop.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00842" /><CodeLine lineNumber="842"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/canonicalloopinfo">CanonicalLoopInfo</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/openmpirbuilder/#a08610118e213de1b759470f0eafb9b18">collapseLoops</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/debugloc">DebugLoc</a> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#ad467c4ab9119043f9b7750ab986be61a">DL</a>,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00843" /><CodeLine lineNumber="843"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                   <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef&lt;CanonicalLoopInfo &#42;&gt;</a> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/hexagon/hexagonhardwareloops-cpp/#ada7c1594a393ede3ce32602d64d7ddb2">Loops</a>,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00844" /><CodeLine lineNumber="844"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                   <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/openmpirbuilder/#aafc1886793b898052f87edd7e9fdbaa3">InsertPointTy</a> ComputeIP);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00845" /><CodeLine lineNumber="845"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00846" /><CodeLine lineNumber="846"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Get the default alignment value for given target</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00847" /><CodeLine lineNumber="847"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00848" /><CodeLine lineNumber="848"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\param TargetTriple   Target triple</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00849" /><CodeLine lineNumber="849"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\param Features       StringMap which describes extra CPU features</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00850" /><CodeLine lineNumber="850"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/openmpirbuilder/#ac5b407054e7727d04053af9c3f1a5568">getOpenMPDefaultSimdAlign</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/triple">Triple</a> &amp;TargetTriple,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00851" /><CodeLine lineNumber="851"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                            </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringmap">StringMap&lt;bool&gt;</a> &amp;Features);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00852" /><CodeLine lineNumber="852"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00853" /><CodeLine lineNumber="853"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Retrieve (or create if non-existent) the address of a declare</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00854" /><CodeLine lineNumber="854"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// target variable, used in conjunction with registerTargetGlobalVariable</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00855" /><CodeLine lineNumber="855"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// to create declare target global variables.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00856" /><CodeLine lineNumber="856"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00857" /><CodeLine lineNumber="857"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\param CaptureClause - enumerator corresponding to the OpenMP capture</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00858" /><CodeLine lineNumber="858"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// clause used in conjunction with the variable being registered (link,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00859" /><CodeLine lineNumber="859"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// to, enter).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00860" /><CodeLine lineNumber="860"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\param DeviceClause - enumerator corresponding to the OpenMP capture</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00861" /><CodeLine lineNumber="861"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// clause used in conjunction with the variable being registered (nohost,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00862" /><CodeLine lineNumber="862"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// host, any)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00863" /><CodeLine lineNumber="863"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\param IsDeclaration - boolean stating if the variable being registered</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00864" /><CodeLine lineNumber="864"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// is a declaration-only and not a definition</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00865" /><CodeLine lineNumber="865"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\param IsExternallyVisible - boolean stating if the variable is externally</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00866" /><CodeLine lineNumber="866"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// visible</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00867" /><CodeLine lineNumber="867"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\param EntryInfo - Unique entry information for the value generated</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00868" /><CodeLine lineNumber="868"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// using getTargetEntryUniqueInfo, used to name generated pointer references</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00869" /><CodeLine lineNumber="869"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// to the declare target variable</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00870" /><CodeLine lineNumber="870"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\param MangledName - the mangled name of the variable being registered</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00871" /><CodeLine lineNumber="871"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\param GeneratedRefs - references generated by invocations of</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00875" /><CodeLine lineNumber="875"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\param TargetTriple - The OpenMP device target triple we are compiling</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00876" /><CodeLine lineNumber="876"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// for</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00877" /><CodeLine lineNumber="877"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\param LlvmPtrTy - The type of the variable we are generating or</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00878" /><CodeLine lineNumber="878"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// retrieving an address for</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00879" /><CodeLine lineNumber="879"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\param GlobalInitializer - a lambda function which creates a constant</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00880" /><CodeLine lineNumber="880"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// used for initializing a pointer reference to the variable in certain</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00882" /><CodeLine lineNumber="882"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// variable to initialize the pointer reference.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00886" /><CodeLine lineNumber="886"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// LLVMModule.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00887" /><CodeLine lineNumber="887"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/constant">Constant</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/openmpirbuilder/#afdc1b8675a946ce055c64607ba75af3a">getAddrOfDeclareTargetVar</a>(</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00897" /><CodeLine lineNumber="897"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Registers a target variable for device or host.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00898" /><CodeLine lineNumber="898"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00967" /><CodeLine lineNumber="967"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Modifies the canonical loop to be a statically-scheduled workshare loop</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00969" /><CodeLine lineNumber="969"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00970" /><CodeLine lineNumber="970"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// This takes a \\p CLI representing a canonical loop, such as the one</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00989" /><CodeLine lineNumber="989"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Modifies the canonical loop to be a statically-scheduled workshare loop.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00990" /><CodeLine lineNumber="990"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00991" /><CodeLine lineNumber="991"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// This takes a \\p LoopInfo representing a canonical loop, such as the one</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01031" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1031"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Modifies the canonical loop to be a dynamically-scheduled workshare loop.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01032" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1032"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01033" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1033"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// This takes a \\p LoopInfo representing a canonical loop, such as the one</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01034" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1034"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// created by \\p createCanonicalLoop and emits additional instructions to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01035" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1035"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// turn it into a workshare loop. In particular, it calls to an OpenMP</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01036" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1036"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// runtime function in the preheader to obtain, and then in each iteration</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01037" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1037"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// to update the loop counter.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01038" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1038"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01039" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1039"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\param DL       Debug location for instructions added for the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01040" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1040"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///                 workshare-loop construct itself.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01041" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1041"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\param CLI      A descriptor of the canonical loop to workshare.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01042" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1042"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\param AllocaIP An insertion point for Alloca instructions usable in the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01043" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1043"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///                 preheader of the loop.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01044" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1044"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\param SchedType Type of scheduling to be passed to the init function.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01045" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1045"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\param NeedsBarrier Indicates whether a barrier must be insterted after</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01046" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1046"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///                     the loop.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01047" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1047"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\param Chunk    The size of loop chunk considered as a unit when</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01048" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1048"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///                 scheduling. If \\p nullptr, defaults to 1</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01049" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1049"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01050" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1050"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\returns Point where to insert code after the workshare construct.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01051" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1051"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/openmpirbuilder/#af24d1c61cec57095ced3b08a6dd99ee8">InsertPointOrErrorTy</a> applyDynamicWorkshareLoop(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/debugloc">DebugLoc</a> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#ad467c4ab9119043f9b7750ab986be61a">DL</a>,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01052" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1052"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                                 <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/canonicalloopinfo">CanonicalLoopInfo</a> &#42;CLI,</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01055" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1055"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                                 </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> NeedsBarrier,</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01058" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1058"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Create alternative version of the loop to support if clause</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01059" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1059"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01060" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1060"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// OpenMP if clause can require to generate second loop. This loop</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01061" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1061"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// will be executed when if clause condition is not met. createIfVersion</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01062" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1062"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// adds branch instruction to the copied loop if \\p  ifCond is not met.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01063" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1063"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01064" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1064"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\param Loop       Original loop which should be versioned.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01065" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1065"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\param IfCond     Value which corresponds to if clause condition</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01066" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1066"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\param VMap       Value to value map to define relation between</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01067" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1067"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///                   original and copied loop values and loop blocks.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01068" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1068"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\param NamePrefix Optional name prefix for if.then if.else blocks.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01069" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1069"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> createIfVersion(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/canonicalloopinfo">CanonicalLoopInfo</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loop">Loop</a>, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;IfCond,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01070" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1070"><span class="doxyHighlight">                       <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#abf0f52ae29f87b5e0f2b95ff961cdae1">ValueToValueMapTy</a> &amp;VMap, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/twine">Twine</a> &amp;NamePrefix = </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01072" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1072"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">public</span><span class="doxyHighlight">:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01073" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1073"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Modifies the canonical loop to be a workshare loop.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01074" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1074"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01075" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1075"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// This takes a \\p LoopInfo representing a canonical loop, such as the one</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01076" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1076"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// created by \\p createCanonicalLoop and emits additional instructions to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01077" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1077"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// turn it into a workshare loop. In particular, it calls to an OpenMP</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01078" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1078"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// runtime function in the preheader to obtain the loop bounds to be used in</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01079" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1079"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// the current thread, updates the relevant instructions in the canonical</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01080" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1080"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// loop and calls to an OpenMP runtime finalization function after the loop.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01081" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1081"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01082" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1082"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// The concrete transformation is done by applyStaticWorkshareLoop,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01083" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1083"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// applyStaticChunkedWorkshareLoop, or applyDynamicWorkshareLoop, depending</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01084" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1084"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// on the value of \\p SchedKind and \\p ChunkSize.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01085" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1085"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01086" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1086"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\param DL       Debug location for instructions added for the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01087" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1087"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///                 workshare-loop construct itself.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01088" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1088"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\param CLI      A descriptor of the canonical loop to workshare.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01089" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1089"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\param AllocaIP An insertion point for Alloca instructions usable in the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01090" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1090"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///                 preheader of the loop.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01091" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1091"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\param NeedsBarrier Indicates whether a barrier must be insterted after</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01092" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1092"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///                     the loop.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01093" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1093"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\param SchedKind Scheduling algorithm to use.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01094" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1094"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\param ChunkSize The chunk size for the inner loop.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01095" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1095"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\param HasSimdModifier Whether the simd modifier is present in the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01096" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1096"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///                        schedule clause.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01097" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1097"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\param HasMonotonicModifier Whether the monotonic modifier is present in</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01098" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1098"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///                             the schedule clause.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01099" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1099"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\param HasNonmonotonicModifier Whether the nonmonotonic modifier is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01100" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1100"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///                                present in the schedule clause.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01101" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1101"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\param HasOrderedClause Whether the (parameterless) ordered clause is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01102" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1102"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///                         present.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01103" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1103"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\param LoopType Information about type of loop worksharing.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01104" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1104"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///                 It corresponds to type of loop workshare OpenMP pragma.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01105" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1105"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01106" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1106"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\returns Point where to insert code after the workshare construct.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01107" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1107"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/openmpirbuilder/#af24d1c61cec57095ced3b08a6dd99ee8">InsertPointOrErrorTy</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/openmpirbuilder/#adaa14806d128ad33bdc48d2bfc46870c">applyWorkshareLoop</a>(</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01108" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1108"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/debugloc">DebugLoc</a> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#ad467c4ab9119043f9b7750ab986be61a">DL</a>, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/canonicalloopinfo">CanonicalLoopInfo</a> &#42;CLI, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/openmpirbuilder/#aafc1886793b898052f87edd7e9fdbaa3">InsertPointTy</a> AllocaIP,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01109" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1109"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> NeedsBarrier,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01110" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1110"><span class="doxyHighlight">      llvm::omp::ScheduleKind SchedKind = llvm::omp::OMP&#95;SCHEDULE&#95;Default,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01111" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1111"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;ChunkSize = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> HasSimdModifier = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01112" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1112"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> HasMonotonicModifier = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> HasNonmonotonicModifier = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1113"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> HasOrderedClause = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01114" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1114"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/omp/#ab6fb146c332fd3f3d677ee65081fe669">omp::WorksharingLoopType</a> LoopType =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01115" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1115"><span class="doxyHighlight">          <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/omp/#ab6fb146c332fd3f3d677ee65081fe669a45663d75b039e00b6412fb82fed8c306">omp::WorksharingLoopType::ForStaticLoop</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01116" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1116"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01117" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1117"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Tile a loop nest.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01118" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1118"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01119" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1119"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Tiles the loops of \\p Loops by the tile sizes in \\p TileSizes. Loops in</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01120" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1120"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\p/ Loops must be perfectly nested, from outermost to innermost loop</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01121" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1121"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// (i.e. Loops.front() is the outermost loop). The trip count llvm::Value</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01122" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1122"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// of every loop and every tile sizes must be usable in the outermost</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01123" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1123"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// loop&#39;s preheader. This implies that the loop nest is rectangular.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01124" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1124"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01125" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1125"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Example:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01126" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1126"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\code</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01127" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1127"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///   for (int i = 0; i &lt; 15; ++i) // Canonical loop &quot;i&quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01128" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1128"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///     for (int j = 0; j &lt; 14; ++j) // Canonical loop &quot;j&quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01129" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1129"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///         body(i, j);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01130" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1130"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\endcode</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01131" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1131"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01132" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1132"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// After tiling with Loops=&#123;i,j&#125; and TileSizes=&#123;5,7&#125;, the loop is changed to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01133" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1133"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\code</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01134" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1134"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///   for (int i1 = 0; i1 &lt; 3; ++i1)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01135" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1135"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///     for (int j1 = 0; j1 &lt; 2; ++j1)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01136" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1136"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///       for (int i2 = 0; i2 &lt; 5; ++i2)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01137" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1137"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///         for (int j2 = 0; j2 &lt; 7; ++j2)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01138" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1138"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///           body(i1&#42;3+i2, j1&#42;3+j2);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01139" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1139"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\endcode</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01140" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1140"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01141" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1141"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// The returned vector are the loops &#123;i1,j1,i2,j2&#125;. The loops i1 and j1 are</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01142" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1142"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// referred to the floor, and the loops i2 and j2 are the tiles. Tiling also</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01143" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1143"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// handles non-constant trip counts, non-constant tile sizes and trip counts</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01144" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1144"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// that are not multiples of the tile size. In the latter case the tile loop</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01145" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1145"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// of the last floor-loop iteration will have fewer iterations than specified</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01146" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1146"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// as its tile size.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01147" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1147"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01148" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1148"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01149" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1149"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// @param DL        Debug location for instructions added by tiling, for</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01150" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1150"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///                  instance the floor- and tile trip count computation.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01151" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1151"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// @param Loops     Loops to tile. The CanonicalLoopInfo objects are</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01152" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1152"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///                  invalidated by this method, i.e. should not used after</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01153" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1153"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///                  tiling.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01154" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1154"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// @param TileSizes For each loop in \\p Loops, the tile size for that</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01155" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1155"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///                  dimensions.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01156" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1156"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01157" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1157"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\returns A list of generated loops. Contains twice as many loops as the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01158" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1158"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///          input loop nest; the first half are the floor loops and the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01159" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1159"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///          second half are the tile loops.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01160" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1160"><span class="doxyHighlight">  std::vector&lt;CanonicalLoopInfo &#42;&gt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01161" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1161"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/openmpirbuilder/#a76e12ec076e7af4be7b8b77a5d53d3fc">tileLoops</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/debugloc">DebugLoc</a> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#ad467c4ab9119043f9b7750ab986be61a">DL</a>, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef&lt;CanonicalLoopInfo &#42;&gt;</a> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/hexagon/hexagonhardwareloops-cpp/#ada7c1594a393ede3ce32602d64d7ddb2">Loops</a>,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01162" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1162"><span class="doxyHighlight">            <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef&lt;Value &#42;&gt;</a> TileSizes);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01163" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1163"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01164" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1164"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Fully unroll a loop.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01165" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1165"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01166" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1166"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Instead of unrolling the loop immediately (and duplicating its body</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01167" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1167"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// instructions), it is deferred to LLVM&#39;s LoopUnrollPass by adding loop</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01168" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1168"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// metadata.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01169" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1169"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01170" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1170"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\param DL   Debug location for instructions added by unrolling.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01171" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1171"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\param Loop The loop to unroll. The loop will be invalidated.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01172" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1172"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/openmpirbuilder/#a28a2a9806d828609fe107f766d2dd569">unrollLoopFull</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/debugloc">DebugLoc</a> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#ad467c4ab9119043f9b7750ab986be61a">DL</a>, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/canonicalloopinfo">CanonicalLoopInfo</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loop">Loop</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01173" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1173"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01174" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1174"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Fully or partially unroll a loop. How the loop is unrolled is determined</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01175" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1175"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// using LLVM&#39;s LoopUnrollPass.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01176" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1176"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01177" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1177"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\param DL   Debug location for instructions added by unrolling.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01178" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1178"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\param Loop The loop to unroll. The loop will be invalidated.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01179" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1179"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/openmpirbuilder/#a4ca0068cb6a50615c74ecdb8f23839e0">unrollLoopHeuristic</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/debugloc">DebugLoc</a> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#ad467c4ab9119043f9b7750ab986be61a">DL</a>, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/canonicalloopinfo">CanonicalLoopInfo</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loop">Loop</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01180" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1180"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01181" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1181"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Partially unroll a loop.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01182" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1182"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01183" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1183"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// The CanonicalLoopInfo of the unrolled loop for use with chained</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01184" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1184"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// loop-associated directive can be requested using \\p UnrolledCLI. Not</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01185" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1185"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// needing the CanonicalLoopInfo allows more efficient code generation by</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01186" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1186"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// deferring the actual unrolling to the LoopUnrollPass using loop metadata.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01187" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1187"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// A loop-associated directive applied to the unrolled loop needs to know the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01188" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1188"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// new trip count which means that if using a heuristically determined unroll</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01189" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1189"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// factor (\\p Factor == 0), that factor must be computed immediately. We are</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01190" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1190"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// using the same logic as the LoopUnrollPass to derived the unroll factor,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01191" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1191"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// but which assumes that some canonicalization has taken place (e.g.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01192" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1192"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Mem2Reg, LICM, GVN, Inlining, etc.). That is, the heuristic will perform</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01193" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1193"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// better when the unrolled loop&#39;s CanonicalLoopInfo is not needed.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01194" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1194"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01195" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1195"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\param DL          Debug location for instructions added by unrolling.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01196" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1196"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\param Loop        The loop to unroll. The loop will be invalidated.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01197" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1197"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\param Factor      The factor to unroll the loop by. A factor of 0</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01198" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1198"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///                    indicates that a heuristic should be used to determine</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01199" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1199"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///                    the unroll-factor.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01200" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1200"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\param UnrolledCLI If non-null, receives the CanonicalLoopInfo of the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01201" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1201"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///                    partially unrolled loop. Otherwise, uses loop metadata</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01202" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1202"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///                    to defer unrolling to the LoopUnrollPass.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01203" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1203"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/openmpirbuilder/#a5e2b7ac5f48193117a340aa15b085719">unrollLoopPartial</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/debugloc">DebugLoc</a> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#ad467c4ab9119043f9b7750ab986be61a">DL</a>, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/canonicalloopinfo">CanonicalLoopInfo</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loop">Loop</a>, int32&#95;t Factor,</span></CodeLine>
