<Link id="l01429" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1429"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01430" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1430"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Emit a helper that reduces data across two OpenMP threads (lanes)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01431" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1431"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// in the same warp.  It uses shuffle instructions to copy over data from</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01432" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1432"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// a remote lane&#39;s stack.  The reduction algorithm performed is specified</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01433" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1433"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// by the fourth parameter.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01434" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1434"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01435" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1435"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Algorithm Versions.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01436" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1436"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Full Warp Reduce (argument value 0):</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01437" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1437"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///   This algorithm assumes that all 32 lanes are active and gathers</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01438" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1438"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///   data from these 32 lanes, producing a single resultant value.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01439" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1439"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Contiguous Partial Warp Reduce (argument value 1):</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01440" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1440"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///   This algorithm assumes that only a &#42;contiguous&#42; subset of lanes</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01441" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1441"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///   are active.  This happens for the last warp in a parallel region</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01442" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1442"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///   when the user specified num&#95;threads is not an integer multiple of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01443" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1443"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///   32  This contiguous subset always starts with the zeroth lane.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01444" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1444"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Partial Warp Reduce (argument value 2):</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01445" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1445"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///   This algorithm gathers data from any number of lanes at any position.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01446" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1446"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// All reduced values are stored in the lowest possible lane.  The set</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01447" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1447"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// of problems every algorithm addresses is a super set of those</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01448" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1448"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// addressable by algorithms with a lower version number.  Overhead</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01449" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1449"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// increases as algorithm version increases.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01450" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1450"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01451" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1451"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Terminology</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01452" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1452"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Reduce element:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01453" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1453"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///   Reduce element refers to the individual data field with primitive</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01454" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1454"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///   data types to be combined and reduced across threads.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01455" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1455"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Reduce list:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01456" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1456"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///   Reduce list refers to a collection of local, thread-private</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01457" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1457"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///   reduce elements.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01458" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1458"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Remote Reduce list:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01459" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1459"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///   Remote Reduce list refers to a collection of remote (relative to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01460" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1460"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///   the current thread) reduce elements.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01461" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1461"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01462" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1462"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// We distinguish between three states of threads that are important to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01463" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1463"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// the implementation of this function.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01464" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1464"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Alive threads:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01465" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1465"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///   Threads in a warp executing the SIMT instruction, as distinguished from</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01466" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1466"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///   threads that are inactive due to divergent control flow.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01467" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1467"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Active threads:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01468" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1468"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///   The minimal set of threads that has to be alive upon entry to this</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01469" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1469"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///   function.  The computation is correct iff active threads are alive.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01470" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1470"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///   Some threads are alive but they are not active because they do not</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01471" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1471"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///   contribute to the computation in any useful manner.  Turning them off</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01472" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1472"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///   may introduce control flow overheads without any tangible benefits.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01473" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1473"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Effective threads:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01474" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1474"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///   In order to comply with the argument requirements of the shuffle</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01475" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1475"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///   function, we must keep all lanes holding data alive.  But at most</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01476" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1476"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///   half of them perform value aggregation; we refer to this half of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01477" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1477"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///   threads as effective. The other half is simply handing off their</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01478" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1478"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///   data.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01479" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1479"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01480" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1480"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Procedure</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01481" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1481"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Value shuffle:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01482" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1482"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///   In this step active threads transfer data from higher lane positions</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01483" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1483"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///   in the warp to lower lane positions, creating Remote Reduce list.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01484" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1484"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Value aggregation:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01485" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1485"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///   In this step, effective threads combine their thread local Reduce list</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01486" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1486"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///   with Remote Reduce list and store the result in the thread local</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01487" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1487"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///   Reduce list.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01488" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1488"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Value copy:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01489" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1489"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///   In this step, we deal with the assumption made by algorithm 2</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01490" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1490"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///   (i.e. contiguity assumption).  When we have an odd number of lanes</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01491" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1491"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///   active, say 2k+1, only k threads will be effective and therefore k</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01492" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1492"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///   new values will be produced.  However, the Reduce list owned by the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01493" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1493"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///   (2k+1)th thread is ignored in the value aggregation.  Therefore</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01494" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1494"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///   we copy the Reduce list from the (2k+1)th lane to (k+1)th lane so</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01495" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1495"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///   that the contiguity assumption still holds.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01496" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1496"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01497" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1497"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\param ReductionInfos Array type containing the ReductionOps.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01498" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1498"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\param ReduceFn The reduction function.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01499" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1499"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\param FuncAttrs Optional param to specify any function attributes that</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01500" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1500"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///                  need to be copied to the new function.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01501" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1501"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01502" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1502"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\return The ShuffleAndReduce function.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01503" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1503"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/codeview/#adfebd8c4ae29ccd84c600c1e65d6b807a86408593c34af77fdd90df932f8b5261">Function</a> &#42;emitShuffleAndReduceFunction(</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01504" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1504"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab9c6b351507d3c0730f4290919d43a12">ArrayRef&lt;OpenMPIRBuilder::ReductionInfo&gt;</a> ReductionInfos,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01505" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1505"><span class="doxyHighlight">      Function &#42;ReduceFn, AttributeList FuncAttrs);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01506" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1506"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01507" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1507"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// This function emits a helper that gathers Reduce lists from the first</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01508" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1508"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// lane of every active warp to lanes in the first warp.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01509" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1509"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01510" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1510"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// void inter&#95;warp&#95;copy&#95;func(void&#42; reduce&#95;data, num&#95;warps)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01511" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1511"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///   shared smem&#91;warp&#95;size&#93;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01512" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1512"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///   For all data entries D in reduce&#95;data:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01513" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1513"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///     sync</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01514" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1514"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///     If (I am the first lane in each warp)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01515" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1515"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///       Copy my local D to smem&#91;warp&#95;id&#93;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01516" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1516"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///     sync</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01517" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1517"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///     if (I am the first warp)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01518" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1518"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///       Copy smem&#91;thread&#95;id&#93; to my local D</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01519" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1519"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01520" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1520"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\param Loc The insert and source location description.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01521" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1521"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\param ReductionInfos Array type containing the ReductionOps.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01522" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1522"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\param FuncAttrs Optional param to specify any function attributes that</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01523" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1523"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///                  need to be copied to the new function.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01524" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1524"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01603" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1603"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\return The GlobalToListReduce function.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01604" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1604"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/codeview/#adfebd8c4ae29ccd84c600c1e65d6b807a86408593c34af77fdd90df932f8b5261">Function</a> &#42;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01605" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1605"><span class="doxyHighlight">  emitGlobalToListReduceFunction(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab9c6b351507d3c0730f4290919d43a12">ArrayRef&lt;ReductionInfo&gt;</a> ReductionInfos,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01606" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1606"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                 Function &#42;ReduceFn, <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/demangle/itaniumdemangle-h/#a88ee8e4eea43084bd8964682683da88caa1fa27779242b4902f7ae3bdd5c6d508">Type</a> &#42;ReductionsBufferTy,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01607" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1607"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                 AttributeList FuncAttrs);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01608" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1608"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01609" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1609"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Get the function name of a reduction function.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01610" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1610"><span class="doxyHighlight">  std::string getReductionFuncName(StringRef Name) </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01611" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1611"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01612" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1612"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Emits reduction function.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01613" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1613"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\param ReducerName Name of the function calling the reduction.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01614" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1614"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\param ReductionInfos Array type containing the ReductionOps.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01615" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1615"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\param ReductionGenCBKind Optional param to specify Clang or MLIR</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01616" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1616"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///                           CodeGenCB kind.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01617" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1617"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\param FuncAttrs Optional param to specify any function attributes that</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01618" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1618"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///                  need to be copied to the new function.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01619" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1619"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01620" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1620"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\return The reduction function.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01621" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1621"><span class="doxyHighlight">  Expected&lt;Function &#42;&gt; createReductionFunction(</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01622" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1622"><span class="doxyHighlight">      StringRef ReducerName, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab9c6b351507d3c0730f4290919d43a12">ArrayRef&lt;ReductionInfo&gt;</a> ReductionInfos,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01623" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1623"><span class="doxyHighlight">      ReductionGenCBKind ReductionGenCBKind = ReductionGenCBKind::MLIR,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01624" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1624"><span class="doxyHighlight">      AttributeList FuncAttrs = &#123;&#125;);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01625" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1625"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01626" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1626"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">public</span><span class="doxyHighlight">:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01627" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1627"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01628" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1628"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Design of OpenMP reductions on the GPU</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01629" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1629"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01630" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1630"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Consider a typical OpenMP program with one or more reduction</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01631" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1631"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// clauses:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01632" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1632"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01633" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1633"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// float foo;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01634" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1634"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// double bar;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01635" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1635"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// #pragma omp target teams distribute parallel for \\</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01636" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1636"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///             reduction(+:foo) reduction(&#42;:bar)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01637" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1637"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// for (int i = 0; i &lt; N; i++) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01638" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1638"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///   foo += A&#91;i&#93;; bar &#42;= B&#91;i&#93;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01639" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1639"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01640" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1640"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01641" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1641"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// where &#39;foo&#39; and &#39;bar&#39; are reduced across all OpenMP threads in</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01642" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1642"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// all teams.  In our OpenMP implementation on the NVPTX device an</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01643" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1643"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// OpenMP team is mapped to a CUDA threadblock and OpenMP threads</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01644" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1644"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// within a team are mapped to CUDA threads within a threadblock.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01645" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1645"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Our goal is to efficiently aggregate values across all OpenMP</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01646" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1646"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// threads such that:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01647" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1647"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01648" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1648"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///   - the compiler and runtime are logically concise, and</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01649" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1649"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///   - the reduction is performed efficiently in a hierarchical</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01650" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1650"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///     manner as follows: within OpenMP threads in the same warp,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01651" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1651"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///     across warps in a threadblock, and finally across teams on</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01652" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1652"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///     the NVPTX device.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01653" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1653"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01654" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1654"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Introduction to Decoupling</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01655" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1655"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01656" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1656"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// We would like to decouple the compiler and the runtime so that the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01657" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1657"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// latter is ignorant of the reduction variables (number, data types)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01658" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1658"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// and the reduction operators.  This allows a simpler interface</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01659" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1659"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// and implementation while still attaining good performance.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01660" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1660"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01661" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1661"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Pseudocode for the aforementioned OpenMP program generated by the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01662" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1662"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// compiler is as follows:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01663" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1663"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01664" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1664"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// 1 Create private copies of reduction variables on each OpenMP</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01665" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1665"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///    thread: &#39;foo&#95;private&#39;, &#39;bar&#95;private&#39;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01666" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1666"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// 2 Each OpenMP thread reduces the chunk of &#39;A&#39; and &#39;B&#39; assigned</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01667" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1667"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///    to it and writes the result in &#39;foo&#95;private&#39; and &#39;bar&#95;private&#39;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01668" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1668"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///    respectively.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01669" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1669"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// 3 Call the OpenMP runtime on the GPU to reduce within a team</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01670" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1670"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///    and store the result on the team master:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01671" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1671"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01672" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1672"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///     &#95;&#95;kmpc&#95;nvptx&#95;parallel&#95;reduce&#95;nowait&#95;v2(...,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01673" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1673"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///        reduceData, shuffleReduceFn, interWarpCpyFn)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01674" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1674"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01675" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1675"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///     where:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01676" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1676"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///       struct ReduceData &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01677" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1677"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///         double &#42;foo;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01678" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1678"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///         double &#42;bar;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01679" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1679"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///       &#125; reduceData</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01680" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1680"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///       reduceData.foo = &amp;foo&#95;private</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01681" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1681"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///       reduceData.bar = &amp;bar&#95;private</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01682" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1682"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01683" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1683"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///     &#39;shuffleReduceFn&#39; and &#39;interWarpCpyFn&#39; are pointers to two</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01684" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1684"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///     auxiliary functions generated by the compiler that operate on</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01685" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1685"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///     variables of type &#39;ReduceData&#39;.  They aid the runtime perform</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01686" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1686"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///     algorithmic steps in a data agnostic manner.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01687" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1687"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01688" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1688"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///     &#39;shuffleReduceFn&#39; is a pointer to a function that reduces data</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01689" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1689"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///     of type &#39;ReduceData&#39; across two OpenMP threads (lanes) in the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01690" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1690"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///     same warp.  It takes the following arguments as input:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01691" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1691"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01692" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1692"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///     a. variable of type &#39;ReduceData&#39; on the calling lane,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01693" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1693"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///     b. its lane&#95;id,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01694" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1694"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///     c. an offset relative to the current lane&#95;id to generate a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01695" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1695"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///        remote&#95;lane&#95;id.  The remote lane contains the second</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01696" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1696"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///        variable of type &#39;ReduceData&#39; that is to be reduced.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01697" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1697"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///     d. an algorithm version parameter determining which reduction</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01698" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1698"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///        algorithm to use.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01699" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1699"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01700" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1700"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///     &#39;shuffleReduceFn&#39; retrieves data from the remote lane using</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01701" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1701"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///     efficient GPU shuffle intrinsics and reduces, using the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01702" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1702"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///     algorithm specified by the 4th parameter, the two operands</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01703" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1703"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///     element-wise.  The result is written to the first operand.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01704" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1704"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01705" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1705"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///     Different reduction algorithms are implemented in different</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01706" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1706"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///     runtime functions, all calling &#39;shuffleReduceFn&#39; to perform</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01707" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1707"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///     the essential reduction step.  Therefore, based on the 4th</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01708" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1708"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///     parameter, this function behaves slightly differently to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01709" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1709"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///     cooperate with the runtime to ensure correctness under</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01710" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1710"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///     different circumstances.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01711" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1711"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01712" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1712"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///     &#39;InterWarpCpyFn&#39; is a pointer to a function that transfers</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01713" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1713"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///     reduced variables across warps.  It tunnels, through CUDA</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01714" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1714"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///     shared memory, the thread-private data of type &#39;ReduceData&#39;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01715" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1715"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///     from lane 0 of each warp to a lane in the first warp.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01716" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1716"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// 4 Call the OpenMP runtime on the GPU to reduce across teams.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01717" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1717"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///    The last team writes the global reduced value to memory.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01718" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1718"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01719" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1719"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///     ret = &#95;&#95;kmpc&#95;nvptx&#95;teams&#95;reduce&#95;nowait(...,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01720" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1720"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///             reduceData, shuffleReduceFn, interWarpCpyFn,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01721" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1721"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///             scratchpadCopyFn, loadAndReduceFn)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01722" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1722"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01723" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1723"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///     &#39;scratchpadCopyFn&#39; is a helper that stores reduced</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01724" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1724"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///     data from the team master to a scratchpad array in</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01725" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1725"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///     global memory.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01726" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1726"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01727" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1727"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///     &#39;loadAndReduceFn&#39; is a helper that loads data from</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01728" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1728"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///     the scratchpad array and reduces it with the input</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01729" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1729"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///     operand.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01730" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1730"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01731" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1731"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///     These compiler generated functions hide address</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01732" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1732"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///     calculation and alignment information from the runtime.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01733" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1733"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// 5 if ret == 1:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01734" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1734"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///     The team master of the last team stores the reduced</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01735" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1735"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///     result to the globals in memory.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01736" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1736"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///     foo += reduceData.foo; bar &#42;= reduceData.bar</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01737" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1737"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01738" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1738"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01739" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1739"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Warp Reduction Algorithms</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01740" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1740"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01741" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1741"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// On the warp level, we have three algorithms implemented in the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01742" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1742"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// OpenMP runtime depending on the number of active lanes:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01743" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1743"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01744" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1744"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Full Warp Reduction</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01745" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1745"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01746" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1746"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// The reduce algorithm within a warp where all lanes are active</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01747" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1747"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// is implemented in the runtime as follows:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01748" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1748"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01749" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1749"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// full&#95;warp&#95;reduce(void &#42;reduce&#95;data,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01750" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1750"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///                  kmp&#95;ShuffleReductFctPtr ShuffleReduceFn) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01751" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1751"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///   for (int offset = WARPSIZE/2; offset &gt; 0; offset /= 2)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01752" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1752"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///     ShuffleReduceFn(reduce&#95;data, 0, offset, 0);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01753" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1753"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01754" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1754"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01755" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1755"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// The algorithm completes in log(2, WARPSIZE) steps.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01756" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1756"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01757" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1757"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// &#39;ShuffleReduceFn&#39; is used here with lane&#95;id set to 0 because it is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01758" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1758"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// not used therefore we save instructions by not retrieving lane&#95;id</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01759" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1759"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// from the corresponding special registers.  The 4th parameter, which</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01760" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1760"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// represents the version of the algorithm being used, is set to 0 to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01761" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1761"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// signify full warp reduction.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01762" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1762"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01763" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1763"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// In this version, &#39;ShuffleReduceFn&#39; behaves, per element, as follows:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01764" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1764"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01765" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1765"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// #reduce&#95;elem refers to an element in the local lane&#39;s data structure</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01766" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1766"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// #remote&#95;elem is retrieved from a remote lane</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01767" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1767"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// remote&#95;elem = shuffle&#95;down(reduce&#95;elem, offset, WARPSIZE);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01768" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1768"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// reduce&#95;elem = reduce&#95;elem REDUCE&#95;OP remote&#95;elem;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01769" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1769"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01770" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1770"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Contiguous Partial Warp Reduction</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01771" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1771"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01772" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1772"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// This reduce algorithm is used within a warp where only the first</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01773" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1773"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// &#39;n&#39; (n &lt;= WARPSIZE) lanes are active.  It is typically used when the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01774" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1774"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// number of OpenMP threads in a parallel region is not a multiple of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01775" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1775"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// WARPSIZE.  The algorithm is implemented in the runtime as follows:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01776" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1776"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01777" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1777"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// void</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01778" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1778"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// contiguous&#95;partial&#95;reduce(void &#42;reduce&#95;data,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01779" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1779"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///                           kmp&#95;ShuffleReductFctPtr ShuffleReduceFn,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01780" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1780"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///                           int size, int lane&#95;id) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01781" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1781"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///   int curr&#95;size;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01782" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1782"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///   int offset;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01783" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1783"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///   curr&#95;size = size;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01784" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1784"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///   mask = curr&#95;size/2;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01785" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1785"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///   while (offset&gt;0) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01786" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1786"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///     ShuffleReduceFn(reduce&#95;data, lane&#95;id, offset, 1);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01787" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1787"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///     curr&#95;size = (curr&#95;size+1)/2;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01788" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1788"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///     offset = curr&#95;size/2;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01789" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1789"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///   &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01790" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1790"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01791" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1791"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01792" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1792"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// In this version, &#39;ShuffleReduceFn&#39; behaves, per element, as follows:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01793" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1793"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01794" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1794"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// remote&#95;elem = shuffle&#95;down(reduce&#95;elem, offset, WARPSIZE);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01795" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1795"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// if (lane&#95;id &lt; offset)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01796" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1796"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///     reduce&#95;elem = reduce&#95;elem REDUCE&#95;OP remote&#95;elem</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01797" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1797"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// else</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01798" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1798"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///     reduce&#95;elem = remote&#95;elem</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01799" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1799"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01800" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1800"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// This algorithm assumes that the data to be reduced are located in a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01801" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1801"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// contiguous subset of lanes starting from the first.  When there is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01802" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1802"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// an odd number of active lanes, the data in the last lane is not</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01803" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1803"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// aggregated with any other lane&#39;s dat but is instead copied over.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01804" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1804"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01805" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1805"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Dispersed Partial Warp Reduction</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01806" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1806"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01807" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1807"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// This algorithm is used within a warp when any discontiguous subset of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01808" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1808"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// lanes are active.  It is used to implement the reduction operation</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01809" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1809"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// across lanes in an OpenMP simd region or in a nested parallel region.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01810" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1810"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01811" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1811"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// void</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01812" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1812"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// dispersed&#95;partial&#95;reduce(void &#42;reduce&#95;data,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01813" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1813"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///                          kmp&#95;ShuffleReductFctPtr ShuffleReduceFn) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01814" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1814"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///   int size, remote&#95;id;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01815" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1815"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///   int logical&#95;lane&#95;id = number&#95;of&#95;active&#95;lanes&#95;before&#95;me() &#42; 2;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01816" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1816"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///   do &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01817" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1817"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///       remote&#95;id = next&#95;active&#95;lane&#95;id&#95;right&#95;after&#95;me();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01818" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1818"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///       # the above function returns 0 of no active lane</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01819" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1819"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///       # is present right after the current lane.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01820" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1820"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///       size = number&#95;of&#95;active&#95;lanes&#95;in&#95;this&#95;warp();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01821" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1821"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///       logical&#95;lane&#95;id /= 2;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01822" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1822"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///       ShuffleReduceFn(reduce&#95;data, logical&#95;lane&#95;id,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01823" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1823"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///                       remote&#95;id-1-threadIdx.x, 2);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01824" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1824"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///   &#125; while (logical&#95;lane&#95;id % 2 == 0 &amp;&amp; size &gt; 1);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01825" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1825"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01826" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1826"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01827" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1827"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// There is no assumption made about the initial state of the reduction.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01828" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1828"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Any number of lanes (&gt;=1) could be active at any position.  The reduction</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01829" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1829"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// result is returned in the first active lane.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01830" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1830"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01831" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1831"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// In this version, &#39;ShuffleReduceFn&#39; behaves, per element, as follows:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01832" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1832"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01833" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1833"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// remote&#95;elem = shuffle&#95;down(reduce&#95;elem, offset, WARPSIZE);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01834" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1834"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// if (lane&#95;id % 2 == 0 &amp;&amp; offset &gt; 0)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01835" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1835"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///     reduce&#95;elem = reduce&#95;elem REDUCE&#95;OP remote&#95;elem</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01836" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1836"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// else</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01837" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1837"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///     reduce&#95;elem = remote&#95;elem</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01838" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1838"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01839" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1839"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01840" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1840"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Intra-Team Reduction</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01841" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1841"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01842" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1842"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// This function, as implemented in the runtime call</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01843" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1843"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// &#39;&#95;&#95;kmpc&#95;nvptx&#95;parallel&#95;reduce&#95;nowait&#95;v2&#39;, aggregates data across OpenMP</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01844" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1844"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// threads in a team.  It first reduces within a warp using the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01845" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1845"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// aforementioned algorithms.  We then proceed to gather all such</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01846" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1846"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// reduced values at the first warp.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01847" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1847"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01848" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1848"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// The runtime makes use of the function &#39;InterWarpCpyFn&#39;, which copies</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01849" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1849"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// data from each of the &quot;warp master&quot; (zeroth lane of each warp, where</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01850" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1850"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// warp-reduced data is held) to the zeroth warp.  This step reduces (in</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01851" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1851"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// a mathematical sense) the problem of reduction across warp masters in</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01852" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1852"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// a block to the problem of warp reduction.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01853" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1853"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01854" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1854"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01855" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1855"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Inter-Team Reduction</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01856" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1856"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01857" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1857"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Once a team has reduced its data to a single value, it is stored in</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01858" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1858"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// a global scratchpad array.  Since each team has a distinct slot, this</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01859" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1859"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// can be done without locking.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01860" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1860"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01861" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1861"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// The last team to write to the scratchpad array proceeds to reduce the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01862" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1862"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// scratchpad array.  One or more workers in the last team use the helper</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01863" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1863"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// &#39;loadAndReduceDataFn&#39; to load and reduce values from the array, i.e.,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01864" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1864"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// the k&#39;th worker reduces every k&#39;th element.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01865" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1865"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01866" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1866"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Finally, a call is made to &#39;&#95;&#95;kmpc&#95;nvptx&#95;parallel&#95;reduce&#95;nowait&#95;v2&#39; to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01867" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1867"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// reduce across workers and compute a globally reduced value.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01868" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1868"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01869" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1869"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\param Loc                The location where the reduction was</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01870" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1870"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///                           encountered. Must be within the associate</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01871" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1871"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///                           directive and after the last local access to the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01872" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1872"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///                           reduction variables.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01873" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1873"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\param AllocaIP           An insertion point suitable for allocas usable</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01874" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1874"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///                           in reductions.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01875" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1875"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\param CodeGenIP           An insertion point suitable for code</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01876" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1876"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// generation. \\param ReductionInfos     A list of info on each reduction</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01877" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1877"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// variable. \\param IsNoWait           Optional flag set if the reduction is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01878" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1878"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// marked as</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01879" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1879"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///                           nowait.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01880" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1880"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\param IsTeamsReduction   Optional flag set if it is a teams</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01881" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1881"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///                           reduction.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01882" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1882"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\param HasDistribute      Optional flag set if it is a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01883" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1883"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///                           distribute reduction.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01884" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1884"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\param GridValue          Optional GPU grid value.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01885" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1885"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\param ReductionBufNum    Optional OpenMPCUDAReductionBufNumValue to be</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01886" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1886"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// used for teams reduction.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01887" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1887"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\param SrcLocInfo         Source location information global.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01888" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1888"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/openmpirbuilder/#af24d1c61cec57095ced3b08a6dd99ee8">InsertPointOrErrorTy</a> createReductionsGPU(</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01889" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1889"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/openmpirbuilder/locationdescription">LocationDescription</a> &amp;Loc, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/openmpirbuilder/#aafc1886793b898052f87edd7e9fdbaa3">InsertPointTy</a> AllocaIP,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01890" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1890"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/openmpirbuilder/#aafc1886793b898052f87edd7e9fdbaa3">InsertPointTy</a> CodeGenIP, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab9c6b351507d3c0730f4290919d43a12">ArrayRef&lt;ReductionInfo&gt;</a> ReductionInfos,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01891" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1891"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> IsNoWait = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> IsTeamsReduction = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01892" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1892"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> HasDistribute = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01893" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1893"><span class="doxyHighlight">      ReductionGenCBKind ReductionGenCBKind = ReductionGenCBKind::MLIR,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01894" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1894"><span class="doxyHighlight">      std::optional&lt;omp::GV&gt; GridValue = &#123;&#125;, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ReductionBufNum = 1024,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01895" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1895"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a066e2a31a13d6520e52ae1944f194662">Value</a> &#42;SrcLocInfo = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01896" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1896"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01897" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1897"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// TODO: provide atomic and non-atomic reduction generators for reduction</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01898" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1898"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// operators defined by the OpenMP specification.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01899" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1899"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01900" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1900"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Generator for &#39;#omp reduction&#39;.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01901" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1901"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01902" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1902"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Emits the IR instructing the runtime to perform the specific kind of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01903" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1903"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// reductions. Expects reduction variables to have been privatized and</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01904" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1904"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// initialized to reduction-neutral values separately. Emits the calls to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01905" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1905"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// runtime functions as well as the reduction function and the basic blocks</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01906" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1906"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// performing the reduction atomically and non-atomically.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01907" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1907"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01908" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1908"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// The code emitted for the following:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01909" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1909"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01910" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1910"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\code</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01911" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1911"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///   type var&#95;1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01912" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1912"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///   type var&#95;2;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01913" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1913"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///   #pragma omp &lt;directive&gt; reduction(reduction-op:var&#95;1,var&#95;2)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01914" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1914"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///   /&#42; body &#42;/;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01915" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1915"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\endcode</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01916" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1916"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01917" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1917"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// corresponds to the following sketch.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01918" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1918"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01919" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1919"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\code</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01920" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1920"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// void &#95;outlined&#95;par() &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01921" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1921"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///   // N is the number of different reductions.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01922" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1922"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///   void &#42;red&#95;array&#91;&#93; = &#123;privatized&#95;var&#95;1, privatized&#95;var&#95;2, ...&#125;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01923" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1923"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///   switch(&#95;&#95;kmpc&#95;reduce(..., N, /&#42;size of data in red array&#42;/, red&#95;array,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01924" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1924"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///                        &#95;omp&#95;reduction&#95;func,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01925" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1925"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///                        &#95;gomp&#95;critical&#95;user.reduction.var)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01926" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1926"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///   case 1: &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01927" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1927"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///     var&#95;1 = var&#95;1 &lt;reduction-op&gt; privatized&#95;var&#95;1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01928" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1928"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///     var&#95;2 = var&#95;2 &lt;reduction-op&gt; privatized&#95;var&#95;2;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01929" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1929"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///     // ...</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01930" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1930"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///    &#95;&#95;kmpc&#95;end&#95;reduce(...);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01931" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1931"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///     break;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01932" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1932"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///   &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01933" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1933"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///   case 2: &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01934" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1934"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///     &#95;Atomic&lt;ReductionOp&gt;(var&#95;1, privatized&#95;var&#95;1);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01935" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1935"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///     &#95;Atomic&lt;ReductionOp&gt;(var&#95;2, privatized&#95;var&#95;2);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01936" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1936"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///     // ...</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01937" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1937"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///     break;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01938" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1938"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///   &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01939" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1939"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///   default: break;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01940" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1940"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///   &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01941" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1941"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01942" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1942"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01943" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1943"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// void &#95;omp&#95;reduction&#95;func(void &#42;&#42;lhs, void &#42;&#42;rhs) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02825" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2825"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Functions used to generate a function with the given name.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02826" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2826"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">using </span><span class="doxyHighlight">FunctionGenCallback =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02827" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2827"><span class="doxyHighlight">      std::function&lt;Expected&lt;Function &#42;&gt;(StringRef FunctionName)&gt;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02828" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2828"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02829" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2829"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Create a unique name for the entry function using the source location</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02830" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2830"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// information of the current target region. The name will be something like:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02831" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2831"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02832" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2832"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// &#95;&#95;omp&#95;offloading&#95;DD&#95;FFFF&#95;PP&#95;lBB&#91;&#95;CC&#93;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02833" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2833"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02834" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2834"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// where DD&#95;FFFF is an ID unique to the file (device and file IDs), PP is the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02835" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2835"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// mangled name of the function that encloses the target region and BB is the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02836" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2836"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// line number of the target region. CC is a count added when more than one</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02837" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2837"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// region is located at the same location.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02838" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2838"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02839" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2839"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// If this target outline function is not an offload entry, we don&#39;t need to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02840" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2840"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// register it. This may happen if it is guarded by an if clause that is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02841" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2841"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// false at compile time, or no target archs have been specified.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02842" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2842"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02843" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2843"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// The created target region ID is used by the runtime library to identify</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02844" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2844"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// the current target region, so it only has to be unique and not</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02845" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2845"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// necessarily point to anything. It could be the pointer to the outlined</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02846" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2846"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// function that implements the target region, but we aren&#39;t using that so</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02847" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2847"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// that the compiler doesn&#39;t need to keep that, and could therefore inline</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02848" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2848"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// the host function if proven worthwhile during optimization. In the other</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02849" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2849"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// hand, if emitting code for the device, the ID has to be the function</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02850" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2850"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// address so that it can retrieved from the offloading entry and launched</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02851" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2851"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// by the runtime library. We also mark the outlined function to have</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02852" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2852"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// external linkage in case we are emitting code for the device, because</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02853" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2853"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// these functions will be entry points to the device.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02854" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2854"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02855" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2855"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\param InfoManager The info manager keeping track of the offload entries</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02856" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2856"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\param EntryInfo The entry information about the function</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02857" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2857"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\param GenerateFunctionCallback The callback function to generate the code</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02858" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2858"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\param OutlinedFunction Pointer to the outlined function</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02859" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2859"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\param EntryFnIDName Name of the ID o be created</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02860" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2860"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac226f3d2b9ca090171a8e0a8cb92c343a902b0d55fddef6f8d651fe1035b7d4bd">Error</a> emitTargetRegionFunction(TargetRegionEntryInfo &amp;EntryInfo,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02861" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2861"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                 FunctionGenCallback &amp;GenerateFunctionCallback,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02862" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2862"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                 </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> IsOffloadEntry, Function &#42;&amp;OutlinedFn,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02863" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2863"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                 Constant &#42;&amp;OutlinedFnID);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02864" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2864"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02865" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2865"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Registers the given function and sets up the attribtues of the function</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02866" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2866"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Returns the FunctionID.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02867" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2867"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02868" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2868"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\param InfoManager The info manager keeping track of the offload entries</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02869" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2869"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\param EntryInfo The entry information about the function</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02871" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2871"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\param EntryFnName Name of the outlined function</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02873" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2873"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/isd/#a22ea9cec080dd5f4f47ba234c2f59110aac2f0a84dd2aa5ee4c3f1385e9565f5e">Constant</a> &#42;registerTargetRegionFunction(TargetRegionEntryInfo &amp;EntryInfo,</span></CodeLine>
